resources.string: 1. Move to one direction by one cell each time.
2. Use less time to hit the higher level, maze will change within random time, be careful with the traps.
3. Use fire ball to attack monsters.
4. Touch the maze to pause the game.
5. Use bonus time sand clock to extend the maze change time by 5 seconds.
6. Marathon Mode: Start with level 1 and record the higher score.
7. Exercise Mode: Choose any level you want to start with, but will not record the score.
